fields.question: What is a micro-app?
fields.answer: A micro-app is a powerful tool accessible via multi-channel in ONEm ecosystem, with dynamic interface and rich content. Micro-apps share a lot of website and app capabilities and in certain circumstances are superior.

fields.question: What cannel does ONEm ecosystem offer?
fields.answer: ONEm's micro-apps unleash the hidden power of SMS, web and multi-channel bot engagement to power smart business applications that work on any mobile.

fields.question: How can i register as a developer?
fields.answer: From ONEm website press the Sign up button or just go to the Developer Portal. You will need a valid Github account.

fields.question: How can i get an API token for my micro-app?
fields.answer: You need to have at least an application in Developer Portal. Click on your application, select API key & permissions tab, choose your permissions and press Generate API key button.

fields.question: How can i upgrade my plan?
fields.answer: The plan applies to an application. In App details tab, under plan section press Change Plan button.

fields.question: How many users can access my micro-app?
fields.answer: Only the Free plan has a limited number of users. For more details check the Pricing section from ONEm website.

fields.question: How can i add my micro-app to ONEm Showcase?
fields.answer: Once you upgrade to a paid plan, you can choose to publish your application. Go to App details tab in Developer Portal and Enable Showcase Listing.

fields.question: Which are the supported programming languages?
fields.answer: Currently ONEm provides SDKs for Python and Node.js, but you can use any programming language as long as your application response is formatted according to our response JSON schema.

fields.question: Where can i find the SDKs?
fields.answer: The ONEm SDKs can be found in our public repository. Link is provided in the documentation.

fields.question: Can i test my application before publishing it?
fields.answer: From Developer Portal go to Test Client section. Insert your mobile number and you can access our simulator and check your application.
